title: Leading 0x is converted to upper-case
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
When it's used "%#X", then the leading '0x' is converted to upper-case too.

What is the expected output?
fmt.Printf("%#X", 13)
>>> 0xD

What do you see instead?
fmt.Printf("%#X", 13)
>>> 0XD

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
GOARCH=amd64
GOOS=linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
5b03f43f6748 tip
